products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the black faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporaryhome. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in todays interiors. All their blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in west yorkshire. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you.

products.title: Fagel Black
products.description: Min width: 360mm max width: 2500mm min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 52% cotton/48% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure fagel black deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
